<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resuscitate](/Feats.aspx?ID=2031) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=69)

**Prerequisites**
[Medic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2027); Legendary in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

**Requirements**
You are holding [healer's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25) or are wearing them and have a hand free. Also, the target's body is mostly intact.

</column>

---

You can use [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) to resuscitate the dead. Attempt a DC 40 Medicine check to revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than 3 rounds. If you succeed, the target returns to life with the effects of [_raise dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=243), except it still has the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition it had before [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11), increased by 1 (or wounded 1 if it wasn't wounded before dying). Whether you succeed or fail, the target is temporarily immune to Resuscitate for 1 day.
